result.summary: Aifirelab is a Saudi Arabian company founded in 2025 that specializes in delivering customized automated workflows for enterprises, large companies, and medium businesses using artificial intelligence. Their technology automates human tasks within systems, including those requiring reasoning, by leveraging custom AI models built with Langraph, Langchain, and Python. The platform offers a user-friendly dashboard allowing clients to monitor and customize AI-driven workflows without technical assistance. The company is headquartered in Riyadh and was co-founded by Nisham Sajjad, who has experience in project management and has completed multiple major projects. Aifirelab aims to enhance operational efficiency by automating complex workflows and providing real-time control and monitoring capabilities to users.

details.founders: Nisham Sajjad, Asbah Riyas, Mohammed Ek
